channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House: Stock market plunge is not as 'meaningful' as business activity
item.description: The Trump administration contends that investments and growth from top businesses means more for the economy than the recent stock market rout.

item.title: Here’s where the U.S. gets its steel and aluminum
Trump raises Canadian steel, aluminum tariffs to 50% in retaliation for Ontario energy duties
item.description: President Donald Trump also declared that if Canada does not lift other tariffs on the U.S., he will "substantially increase" auto import tariffs next...

item.title: Can Trump launch Iran nuclear deal 2.0 in second White House term?
item.description: Trump sent a letter to Iran's supreme leader expressing his desire for a deal.

item.title: Latest stock-market leg lower linked to job-openings data — live updates
DOGE chief Elon Musk says he's running businesses 'with great difficulty' as Tesla shares tank
item.description: The Tesla CEO Musk said he expected to realize $1 trillion in government savings for the Trump administration as part of the DOGE project.

item.title: Dow forfeits a further 250 points early Tuesday on heels of 900-point free fall
This analyst thinks a deeper bear market is less likely
The anywhere-but-America trade has been working. But there are limits.
Ontario's Doug Ford warns of 'Trump recession,' threatens electrical shutoff to U.S.
item.description: Trump said that if Canada cuts off electricity exports to the United States as part of the ongoing trade war "they will pay a financial price for this...
